name: Tapispotify
description: Developed a Web app using Spotify’s API for data analysis and visualization
Used ExpressJS to connect to Spotify’s API and fetch user’s listening data
Designed a Mobile-first React user Interface for the application using Material-UI
Using C3.js developed data visualization charts for user listening habits analytics

name: Familiar Faces Recognition
description: Developed Python application that detects previously saved faces for Authorization control
Used OpenCV as a framework for fast delivery and tested reliability
Implemented continous delivery and long-term support for the project using Git versions
Developed File server for saving familiar faces saved through Camera/file input

name: Traffic Light Simulator
description: For IBM, developed real-time traffic light simulator using Python and Unity
Used Unity to display models on a simulation that interact on a grid with fetched positions
Developed backend using flask that connects to the Python simulation, and sends data to Unity
Created container for deployment in servers with Docker
